title: The Phone Wars
description:
The latest season of Land of the Giants explains the rise of Google from a company with idealistic goals of creative experimentation and making useful products to a worldwide powerhouse with enormous impact on our lives. This is an excerpt from Episode 2: Chrome and the Android Wars. Listen here: 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:title: The Phone Wars
itunes:author: Recode
itunes:subtitle: Apple and Google were once friends, but that changed with the rise of iOS and Android.
